about_the_game:
What is «REWOLBOROUGH»?

This is a story about a girl named Suzen, who unwillingly became involved in an illegal “family” business. Having revealed the disconcerting truth about her past life, the heroine has only one desire - to unravel the sinister web of conspiracy that has covered every corner of this troubled city.

Only one chapter is available in this demo:

Chapter I The Awakening

PDF version of the digital manga are available in the root folder.
detailed_description:
What is «REWOLBOROUGH»?

This is a story about a girl named Suzen, who unwillingly became involved in an illegal “family” business. Having revealed the disconcerting truth about her past life, the heroine has only one desire - to unravel the sinister web of conspiracy that has covered every corner of this troubled city.

Only one chapter is available in this demo:

Chapter I The Awakening

PDF version of the digital manga are available in the root folder.
name: REWOLBOROUGH VOL.1 THE AWAKENING

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 234 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 234 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to Rewolborough, a hard-boiled metropolis whose faceless facade hides the reeking wastes of the human psyche.
